note: cc106 - Export DV Lifestyle Kitchen Benchtops and Install
expression:
FOREACH $$choice$$ IN $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size$$ ,
  IF $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 3.5m" OR $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 4m" OR $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 4.6m"
  THEN
    //set variables
    $kitchensize = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size/Kitchen/item$$
    $bench_colour = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Kitchen/item$$
    $sink_type =$$Choices/Plumbing/Plumbing - Kitchen Sink/Kitchen/item$$

    //REAR benchtops
    IF $kitchensize == "Lifestyle 4.6m" THEN
      //rear benchtops for 4.6m lifestyle only
      SWITCH($bench_colour,
        CASE "20mm Carrera White", EXPORT("106.0037", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Cotton White",  EXPORT("106.0039", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Concrete Grey", EXPORT("106.0041", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Midnight Sky",  EXPORT("106.0043", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Storm Grey",    EXPORT("106.00441", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 2, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
      )
    ELSE
      //rear benchtops for 3.6 AND 4m lifestyle
      SWITCH($bench_colour,
        CASE "20mm Carrera White", EXPORT("106.0045", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Cotton White",  EXPORT("106.0047", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Concrete Grey", EXPORT("106.0049", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Midnight Sky",  EXPORT("106.0051", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Storm Grey",    EXPORT("106.00534", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 2, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
      )
    ENDIF

    //ISLAND BENCHTOPS
    IF $sink_type == contains($sink_type, "Premio") THEN
      //Premio above mount island benchtop only
      SWITCH($bench_colour,
        CASE "20mm Carrera White", EXPORT("106.0017", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Cotton White",  EXPORT("106.0019", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Concrete Grey", EXPORT("106.0021", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Midnight Sky",  EXPORT("106.0023", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Storm Grey",    EXPORT("106.00235", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 2, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
      )
      //Include a sink AND install sink
      EXPORT(120.613, 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
      EXPORT(106.745, 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
    ELSE
      //Ultimo undermount mount island benchtop only
      SWITCH($bench_colour,
        CASE "20mm Carrera White", EXPORT("106.0025", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Cotton White",  EXPORT("106.0027", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Concrete Grey", EXPORT("106.0029", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Midnight Sky",  EXPORT("106.0031", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        CASE "20mm Storm Grey",    EXPORT("106.00331", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 2, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
      )
      //Include a sink AND install sink
      EXPORT(120.616, 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
      EXPORT(106.740, 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
    ENDIF

    //export DV kitchen benchtop install 
    EXPORT("106.710", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
  ENDIF
NEXT
